#summary zTag based Form generator
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

This is just one of the many available samples entirely made using zTag, this one was developed to help you to create your own zTag forms.

This sample use the zDBAL, that uses the DBAL form Doctrine project.

[http://code.google.com/p/ztag/source/browse/ztag/sample/sistema/ Source]

= Source files =

Here the list of each source file
  * [http://code.google.com/p/ztag/source/browse/ztag/sample/sistema/mysqlDatabases.ztag mysqlDatabases.ztag] - list all databases
  * [http://code.google.com/p/ztag/source/browse/ztag/sample/sistema/mysqlTables.ztag mysqlTables.ztag] - list all tables for the current database
  * [http://code.google.com/p/ztag/source/browse/ztag/sample/sistema/mysqlTable.ztag mysqlTable.ztag] - List all colums for the current table
  * [http://code.google.com/p/ztag/source/browse/ztag/sample/sistema/mysqlTableForm.ztag mysqlTableForm.ztag] - Generates a complete form
  * [http://code.google.com/p/ztag/source/browse/ztag/sample/sistema/mysqlTableList.ztag mysqlTableList.ztag] - Generate a list
